content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":256612,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t引きこもりのフェリスを元気づけるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance cheers up the withdrawn Felice."},{"lineNumber":256613,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":256614,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t留守番している美樹","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki is staying home watching the castle."},{"lineNumber":256615,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王になる事を恐れ、力が出てくる事を怖がっている","translatedEnglishLine":"She fears becoming the Demon King and is scared of her power manifesting."},{"lineNumber":256616,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile,"},{"lineNumber":256617,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達のすぐ近くの街道・・","translatedEnglishLine":"On the road very near to Lance and his group..."},{"lineNumber":256618,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍の偵察部隊が魔王美樹を捜している","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's reconnaissance unit is searching for Demon King Miki."},{"lineNumber":256619,"originalJapaneseLine":"クエストの最初、または大きく場所が変わった所は","translatedEnglishLine":"At the start of a quest, or when location changes significantly,"},{"lineNumber":256620,"originalJapaneseLine":"現在値等の表示を入れる","translatedEnglishLine":"display the current values and such."},{"lineNumber":256621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んんー……素晴らしい…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... wonderful...!\""},{"lineNumber":256622,"originalJapaneseLine":"うずたかく積み上げられた金銀財宝に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Before the towering piles of gold and silver treasures,"},{"lineNumber":256623,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロは感嘆の溜息を漏らした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pisaro let out a sigh of admiration."},{"lineNumber":256624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「閣下。人間共の駆逐計画ですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your Excellency. Regarding the plan to exterminate the humans..."},{"lineNumber":256625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これからどういたしましょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What shall we do from here?\""},{"lineNumber":256626,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは、ニコペリ村","translatedEnglishLine":"This is Nikoperi Village."},{"lineNumber":256627,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がやってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and his group have arrived."},{"lineNumber":256628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who knows."},{"lineNumber":256629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、かなみ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Kanami.\""},{"lineNumber":256630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやーん、ふっふーん","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek, hoo hoo!"},{"lineNumber":256631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこそこ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's it, that's it.\""},{"lineNumber":256632,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile..."},{"lineNumber":256633,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン北部へ進行しているリーザス軍の","translatedEnglishLine":"The Lizas army advancing toward northern Helman,"},{"lineNumber":256634,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線基地では","translatedEnglishLine":"at the frontline base,"},{"lineNumber":256635,"originalJapaneseLine":"「????なんと、魔人を仲間にですと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!? A demon ally has joined us!?\""},{"lineNumber":256636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「????なんと、魔人を仲間にですと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!? A demon ally has joined us!?\""},{"lineNumber":256637,"originalJapaneseLine":"――大陸の南東部、自由都市地帯。","translatedEnglishLine":"-- Southeastern part of the continent, Free Cities zone."},{"lineNumber":256638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んんー……素晴らしい…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... wonderful...!\""},{"lineNumber":256639,"originalJapaneseLine":"おわり","translatedEnglishLine":"The End."},{"lineNumber":256640,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、参謀本部","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance Castle, Strategy Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":256641,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の増援を止めないと勝てない","translatedEnglishLine":"We won’t win unless we stop the demon army reinforcements."},{"lineNumber":256642,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、参謀本部","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance Castle, Strategy Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":256643,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の行方はいまだ分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"The whereabouts of the Demon King remain unknown."},{"lineNumber":256644,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスがクルックーの法王特典を使用を頼む","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance asks to use Kluukoo's Pope privileges."},{"lineNumber":256645,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t割れた鋼鉄黒飴貝を直して欲しいと","translatedEnglishLine":"He wants the cracked steel black candy shell to be repaired."},{"lineNumber":256646,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t法王特典を使ってしまいます","translatedEnglishLine":"He ends up using the Pope privileges."},{"lineNumber":256647,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、どこかで・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, somewhere else..."},{"lineNumber":256648,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tテオマンが活躍すると人類が被害を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"If Teoman acts vigorously, humanity will suffer."},{"lineNumber":256649,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、どこかで・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, somewhere else..."},{"lineNumber":256650,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tテオマンが活躍すると人類が被害を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"If Teoman acts vigorously, humanity will suffer."},{"lineNumber":256651,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件：グリーン、ブルー、レッドハニーがいる事","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: Green, Blue, and Red Honey must be present."},{"lineNumber":256652,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の日常","translatedEnglishLine":"Daily life at Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":256653,"originalJapaneseLine":"はにはにといつの間にかハニー達が増えている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, the Honeys have increased in number."},{"lineNumber":256654,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタさんはともかく他のメイドさん達は迷惑に思っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta doesn't mind, but the other maids feel bothered."},{"lineNumber":256655,"originalJapaneseLine":"気のせいかあいつら増えている気がするのだけど・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it's my imagination, but I feel like those guys are multiplying..."},{"lineNumber":256656,"originalJapaneseLine":"はにはに・・確かに増えている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys... certainly appear to be increasing."},{"lineNumber":256657,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうね、友達読んでいるのかしら？","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, maybe they are calling friends?"},{"lineNumber":256658,"originalJapaneseLine":"はにはに、さらに増えている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys seem to be increasing even more."},{"lineNumber":256659,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうするの・・　元はと言えば、ランス総統が気まぐれでハニーを捕獲したのが始まりだし","translatedEnglishLine":"What to do... After all, it started when President Lance whimsically captured the Honeys."},{"lineNumber":256660,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達の立場で勝手に追い出すなんて出来ないしね。","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't just kick them out on our own, given our position."},{"lineNumber":256661,"originalJapaneseLine":"はにはに・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys..."},{"lineNumber":256662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":256663,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある日、ランスも気がつく・・うわっ、なんだ、ハニワがいっぱい","translatedEnglishLine":"One day, Lance notices too... \"Whoa, what is this, so many Honey dolls!\""},{ "lineNumber":256664,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、かってに増殖しやがって捨ててこい","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, stop multiplying on your own! Throw them away!"},{"lineNumber":256665,"originalJapaneseLine":"まってよ、ぼくたちも一緒に魔人と戦いたい−、仲間外れいやなのだー、参加したいー","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait! We want to fight demons together too - we don’t want to be left out, we want to join!"},{"lineNumber":256666,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争したい、平和守りたい、遊びたい、戦いたい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to fight war, protect peace, play, and fight..."},{"lineNumber":256667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザが誰かが、数えた所、すでに５千ほどが周辺に集まっているようです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone named Ulza counted, and there seem to be about 5,000 gathered nearby already."},{"lineNumber":256668,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らにとっては遊びなのでしょうが、規律を守って一緒に戦いたいというのは本当みたいなので","translatedEnglishLine":"For them, it might just be play, but they really seem to want to fight together while keeping discipline."},{"lineNumber":256669,"originalJapaneseLine":"今は少しでも戦力が欲しい所、手伝ってもらってはどうでしょうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, since we need any combat strength we can get, how about letting them help?"},{"lineNumber":256670,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・うーん、まじか・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmm, seriously..."},{"lineNumber":256671,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２２０／９／ケッセルリンク／戦闘後　実行後","translatedEnglishLine":"220/9/Kessel Link/ After combat execution"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引きこもりのフェリスを元気づけるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance cheers up the withdrawn Felice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 留守番している美樹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki is staying home watching the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になる事を恐れ、力が出てくる事を怖がっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She fears becoming the Demon King and is scared of her power manifesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達のすぐ近くの街道・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the road very near to Lance and his group...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の偵察部隊が魔王美樹を捜している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's reconnaissance unit is searching for Demon King Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエストの最初、または大きく場所が変わった所は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the start of a quest, or when location changes significantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在値等の表示を入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: display the current values and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んんー……素晴らしい…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... wonderful...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うずたかく積み上げられた金銀財宝に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the towering piles of gold and silver treasures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは感嘆の溜息を漏らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pisaro let out a sigh of admiration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「閣下。人間共の駆逐計画ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your Excellency. Regarding the plan to exterminate the humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどういたしましょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What shall we do from here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは、ニコペリ村
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is Nikoperi Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がやってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group have arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who knows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、かなみ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Kanami."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやーん、ふっふーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, hoo hoo!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこそこ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's it, that's it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン北部へ進行しているリーザス軍の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lizas army advancing toward northern Helman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線基地では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at the frontline base,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「????なんと、魔人を仲間にですと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!? A demon ally has joined us!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「????なんと、魔人を仲間にですと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!? A demon ally has joined us!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――大陸の南東部、自由都市地帯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- Southeastern part of the continent, Free Cities zone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んんー……素晴らしい…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... wonderful...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おわり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The End.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、参謀本部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle, Strategy Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の増援を止めないと勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We won’t win unless we stop the demon army reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、参謀本部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle, Strategy Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の行方はいまだ分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The whereabouts of the Demon King remain unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがクルックーの法王特典を使用を頼む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance asks to use Kluukoo's Pope privileges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割れた鋼鉄黒飴貝を直して欲しいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants the cracked steel black candy shell to be repaired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王特典を使ってしまいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He ends up using the Pope privileges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、どこかで・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, somewhere else...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テオマンが活躍すると人類が被害を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Teoman acts vigorously, humanity will suffer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、どこかで・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, somewhere else...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テオマンが活躍すると人類が被害を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Teoman acts vigorously, humanity will suffer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：グリーン、ブルー、レッドハニーがいる事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: Green, Blue, and Red Honey must be present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daily life at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはにといつの間にかハニー達が増えている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, the Honeys have increased in number.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんはともかく他のメイドさん達は迷惑に思っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta doesn't mind, but the other maids feel bothered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気のせいかあいつら増えている気がするのだけど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's my imagination, but I feel like those guys are multiplying...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはに・・確かに増えている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys... certainly appear to be increasing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうね、友達読んでいるのかしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, maybe they are calling friends?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはに、さらに増えている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys seem to be increasing even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするの・・　元はと言えば、ランス総統が気まぐれでハニーを捕獲したのが始まりだし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What to do... After all, it started when President Lance whimsically captured the Honeys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の立場で勝手に追い出すなんて出来ないしね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't just kick them out on our own, given our position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはに・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日、ランスも気がつく・・うわっ、なんだ、ハニワがいっぱい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day, Lance notices too... "Whoa, what is this, so many Honey dolls!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、かってに増殖しやがって捨ててこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, stop multiplying on your own! Throw them away!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まってよ、ぼくたちも一緒に魔人と戦いたい−、仲間外れいやなのだー、参加したいー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait! We want to fight demons together too - we don’t want to be left out, we want to join!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争したい、平和守りたい、遊びたい、戦いたい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to fight war, protect peace, play, and fight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザが誰かが、数えた所、すでに５千ほどが周辺に集まっているようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone named Ulza counted, and there seem to be about 5,000 gathered nearby already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らにとっては遊びなのでしょうが、規律を守って一緒に戦いたいというのは本当みたいなので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For them, it might just be play, but they really seem to want to fight together while keeping discipline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は少しでも戦力が欲しい所、手伝ってもらってはどうでしょうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, since we need any combat strength we can get, how about letting them help?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・うーん、まじか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmm, seriously...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２２０／９／ケッセルリンク／戦闘後　実行後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 220/9/Kessel Link/ After combat execution

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

After all, it started when President Lance whimsically captured the Honeys."},{"lineNumber":256660,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達の立場で勝手に追い出すなんて出来ないしね。","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't just kick them out on our own, given our position."},{"lineNumber":256661,"originalJapaneseLine":"はにはに・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys..."},{"lineNumber":256662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":256663,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある日、ランスも気がつく・・うわっ、なんだ、ハニワがいっぱい","translatedEnglishLine":"One day, Lance notices too... \"Whoa, what is this, so many Honey dolls!\""},{ "lineNumber":256664,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、かってに増殖しやがって捨ててこい","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, stop multiplying on your own! Throw them away!"},{"lineNumber":256665,"originalJapaneseLine":"まってよ、ぼくたちも一緒に魔人と戦いたい−、仲間外れいやなのだー、参加したいー","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait! We want to fight demons together too - we don’t want to be left out, we want to join!"},{"lineNumber":256666,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争したい、平和守りたい、遊びたい、戦いたい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to fight war, protect peace, play, and fight..."},{"lineNumber":256667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザが誰かが、数えた所、すでに５千ほどが周辺に集まっているようです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone named Ulza counted, and there seem to be about 5,000 gathered nearby already."},{"lineNumber":256668,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らにとっては遊びなのでしょうが、規律を守って一緒に戦いたいというのは本当みたいなので","translatedEnglishLine":"For them, it might just be play, but they really seem to want to fight together while keeping discipline."},{"lineNumber":256669,"originalJapaneseLine":"今は少しでも戦力が欲しい所、手伝ってもらってはどうでしょうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, since we need any combat strength we can get, how about letting them help?"},{"lineNumber":256670,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・うーん、まじか・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmm, seriously..."},{"lineNumber":256671,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２２０／９／ケッセルリンク／戦闘後　実行後","translatedEnglishLine":"220/9/Kessel Link/ After combat execution"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引きこもりのフェリスを元気づけるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance cheers up the withdrawn Felice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 留守番している美樹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki is staying home watching the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になる事を恐れ、力が出てくる事を怖がっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She fears becoming the Demon King and is scared of her power manifesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達のすぐ近くの街道・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the road very near to Lance and his group...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の偵察部隊が魔王美樹を捜している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's reconnaissance unit is searching for Demon King Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエストの最初、または大きく場所が変わった所は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the start of a quest, or when location changes significantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在値等の表示を入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: display the current values and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んんー……素晴らしい…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... wonderful...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うずたかく積み上げられた金銀財宝に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the towering piles of gold and silver treasures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロは感嘆の溜息を漏らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pisaro let out a sigh of admiration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「閣下。人間共の駆逐計画ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your Excellency. Regarding the plan to exterminate the humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどういたしましょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What shall we do from here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは、ニコペリ村
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is Nikoperi Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がやってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group have arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who knows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、かなみ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Kanami."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやーん、ふっふーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, hoo hoo!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこそこ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's it, that's it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン北部へ進行しているリーザス軍の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lizas army advancing toward northern Helman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線基地では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at the frontline base,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「????なんと、魔人を仲間にですと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!? A demon ally has joined us!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「????なんと、魔人を仲間にですと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!? A demon ally has joined us!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――大陸の南東部、自由都市地帯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- Southeastern part of the continent, Free Cities zone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んんー……素晴らしい…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... wonderful...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おわり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The End.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、参謀本部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle, Strategy Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の増援を止めないと勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We won’t win unless we stop the demon army reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、参謀本部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle, Strategy Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の行方はいまだ分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The whereabouts of the Demon King remain unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがクルックーの法王特典を使用を頼む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance asks to use Kluukoo's Pope privileges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割れた鋼鉄黒飴貝を直して欲しいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants the cracked steel black candy shell to be repaired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王特典を使ってしまいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He ends up using the Pope privileges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、どこかで・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, somewhere else...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テオマンが活躍すると人類が被害を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Teoman acts vigorously, humanity will suffer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、どこかで・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, somewhere else...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テオマンが活躍すると人類が被害を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Teoman acts vigorously, humanity will suffer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：グリーン、ブルー、レッドハニーがいる事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: Green, Blue, and Red Honey must be present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daily life at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはにといつの間にかハニー達が増えている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, the Honeys have increased in number.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんはともかく他のメイドさん達は迷惑に思っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta doesn't mind, but the other maids feel bothered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気のせいかあいつら増えている気がするのだけど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's my imagination, but I feel like those guys are multiplying...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはに・・確かに増えている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys... certainly appear to be increasing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうね、友達読んでいるのかしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, maybe they are calling friends?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはに、さらに増えている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys seem to be increasing even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするの・・　元はと言えば、ランス総統が気まぐれでハニーを捕獲したのが始まりだし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What to do... After all, it started when President Lance whimsically captured the Honeys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の立場で勝手に追い出すなんて出来ないしね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't just kick them out on our own, given our position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにはに・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日、ランスも気がつく・・うわっ、なんだ、ハニワがいっぱい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day, Lance notices too... "Whoa, what is this, so many Honey dolls!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、かってに増殖しやがって捨ててこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, stop multiplying on your own! Throw them away!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まってよ、ぼくたちも一緒に魔人と戦いたい−、仲間外れいやなのだー、参加したいー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait! We want to fight demons together too - we don’t want to be left out, we want to join!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争したい、平和守りたい、遊びたい、戦いたい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to fight war, protect peace, play, and fight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザが誰かが、数えた所、すでに５千ほどが周辺に集まっているようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone named Ulza counted, and there seem to be about 5,000 gathered nearby already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らにとっては遊びなのでしょうが、規律を守って一緒に戦いたいというのは本当みたいなので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For them, it might just be play, but they really seem to want to fight together while keeping discipline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は少しでも戦力が欲しい所、手伝ってもらってはどうでしょうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, since we need any combat strength we can get, how about letting them help?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・うーん、まじか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmm, seriously...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２２０／９／ケッセルリンク／戦闘後　実行後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 220/9/Kessel Link/ After combat execution
